COMMENT_TX: $Aaron Miles switch hits his first 2 career homers
ej,brenb001,M,darlg901,Balls and strikes D-Backs manager Bob Brenly ejected by HP umpire Gary Darling sometime in the ninth arguing balls and strikes
ej,hurdc001,M,timmt901,Fan interference non-call Rockies Manager Clint Hurdle ejected by 3B umpire Tim Timimons for demanding a fan interference call
$Thome dropped foul popups on 2 consecutive pitches
$Perez allowed the soft liner to drop in front of him; Johnson got caught not knowing which way to move
$Thome received a standing ovation after dropping 2 popups earlier

ej,reeds001,P,drecb901,Claimed batter leaned into HBP Steve Reed ejected by HP umpire Bruce Dreckman; Reed argued that A.J. Pierzynski leaned into the pitch; Manager Clint Hurdle had to restrain Reed as he argued with the umpire; Reed later claimed that Dreckman swore at him; Reed threw his glove towards the umpire as he left the field

ej,dohms001,P,iassd901,Beanball ej,hurdc001,M,iassd901,Arguing Dohmann ejection Scott Dohmann ejected by HP umpire Dan Iassogna after a high inside pitch to Aramis Ramirez; Manager Clint Hurdle argued briefly before sending in the new pitcher and then argued more; Hurdle was also ejected
